name: Execution and levies prohibited
text: §560:3-812  Execution and levies prohibited.  No execution may issue upon nor may any levy be made against any property of the estate under any judgment against a decedent or a personal representative, but this section shall not be construed to prevent the enforcement of mortgages, pledges or liens upon real or personal property in an appropriate proceeding. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
